name: Midnight Sadistic
nutshell:
"You know what you look like right now?
You have that look on your face that says, "I'm happy to be teased."
As retribution for his debtor's nocturnal escape, Takuma now works for a loan shark company and eventually freeloads at his company President, Koujina's storage room. But then, one night, he was offered to give the president fellatio in exchange for money, which led him to realize that he was an "extreme masochist"!
"I want to be satisfied by the President's teasing again...!"
A story of the company's extreme sadist president and a taciturn, loyal dog, extreme masochist underling's sweet, randy, and erotic SM exploits ❤.

name: Touhou - Kimi to Issho (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A Seiga x Yoshika doujin.

name: I Am a Small Kitten
tags: Animals,Long Strip,Comedy,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: Somewhere within a family of three, lived four cute pets: three balls of purrs and a little puppy. Not a moment goes by without something interesting happening with these four adorable pets each and every day…

name: Boku no Ibitsu na Rakuen
nutshell: Shuuhei y Yakumo solían vivir juntos atrapados en la casa del "señor" , donde les enseñaron a tener conductas inmorales como "pareja". Al ser arrestado el "señor", estos dos no vuelven a verse hasta después de 12 años cuando se reúnen por coincidencia. Sin poder dejar a Yakumo, quien parece estar siendo presionado para tener sexo por su verdadero hermano, Shuuhei decide llevarlo a casa. Un amor inmoral de apego y dependencia comienza..

name: Senpai 4koma.
tags: Official Colored,Comedy,Girls' Love,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life
nutshell:
Yuri 4koma about a senior and her juniors who love her so much.
In 2016, Tankoubon version published by KADOKAWA titled 「Senpai Ai」

Links:
 Artist’s Pixiv
 Artist’s Twitter

name: Good Morning Kiss
nutshell: The sequel to Good Morning Call. The series takes place a few years after GMC. Nao and Hisashi are in college and are living in across from each other in an apartment complex. When Nao's father pays a visit and learns of Hisashi he takes Nao back to her family. Hisashi realizes how much he hates being away from her and proposes.

name: A Happy Couple
nutshell: A story about a happy couple.

name: Embrace the Moment
nutshell: University student Yan Fu who lives outside the dormitory has a neighbour, Liu Zi Ning, who is a single dad. Liu Zi Ning doesn’t know how to take care of a baby, but Yan Fu knows how to, the two people and baby became a warm “family of three”. When Yan Fu’s feelings towards Liu Zi Ning are increasing everyday, Liu Zi Ning is having thoughts of having a girlfriend.

name: Tama to Tama to
nutshell: Tama and Aoi are friends from childhood. Tama is a shrine maiden that is not allowed to ever leave the village she grew up in because if she does, a terrible curse will unfold. Very much unlike Aoi, who's a normal girl and is free to do whatever she wants with her life. When Aoi's parents die, she has to move out of the village. To her dismay, Tama follows her in order to make sure Aoi fulfills a promise she made to her when they were younger…

name: Mashima HERO'S
nutshell:
A crossover of Rave, Fairy Tail, and Edens Zero to celebrate the 60th anniversary of Shounen Magazine.

Official Release:

Indonesian release by Level Comics

name: Askr Yggdrasil's Wood
nutshell: Exiled to a desolate and harsh planet, Ayr spends his days hunting giant monsters as his food source. Then, everything changes when a police officer comes and tells him his exile was revoked. After arriving in Askr he learns that a lot of time has passed while he was gone. 100 years. Everything seems to be different now, but one question remains: For what reason was his exile revoked after this long time?

name: Until my new teacher is totally defeated
nutshell: Story of a young girl and her teacher

name: Doll Koma 2
nutshell:
The Commander and her girls go on with their daily, goofy, lives. Sangvis Ferri is there too.
Girls' Frontline Doujinshi.

name: Oh, My Devil!
nutshell: A stranger calls me his girlfriend!

name: Watashitachi wa Koi wo Shiranai
nutshell: It's the fall of the first year of high school. After changing seats, Yuki Amano and Hayato Kuga became seat partners. Kuga attempts to get the silent Amano to open up, but she does not even show a smile. Meanwhile, Amano also starts to show interest in the airhead Kuga. They've fallen in love, but they have yet to realize their feelings. The heart pounding love comedy begins!

name: Dead Mount Death Play
nutshell:
A Necromancer called The Corpse God is fighting against the Church, that is trying to subjugate him. Using his last ounce of power against the Calamity Crusher, he gets defeated, but his reincarnation magic activates.
Suddenly, he got transported in a world of modern society and in a body of kid Polka Shinoyama. What is gonna happen to him in this world? What will he do?

name: BOX - Something's in the Box
nutshell:
Seven people received a "puzzle" and ticket from an unknown sender, and followed the ticket to a strange square house. A mysterious woman who came "out of curiosity" joined them, and what awaited those people in the house was a girl as beautiful as a doll and maze beyond imagination. They cannot leave unless they solve the puzzle. When it's solved, part of your body will disappear! Can they escape? And, just who invited them there?
From Anilist

name: Meruhen-chan
nutshell:
Date, a Scottish transfer student, has always dreamed of seeing faeries and living in a magical world. But due to her constant daydreaming, she fails to make any friends on her first week. However, when she gets hit on the head, she suddenly receives the 'sight' and can see a little pixie called Rabiko!
So she starts off the year, and might even make a friend along the way!

name: When Sex Friends Fall in Love
nutshell: The two of us are just sex friends... but the truth is... I'm actually in love with him (her)! Oblivious to each other's feelings, what does the future hold in store for these lovebirds?

name: Sono Kuchibiru wo Hirake
nutshell: Tamaki is in love with Shinji, a spoiled, arrogant and self-centered guy. Lately Shinji has been playfully clinging and getting too close to Tamaki to deal with all the tension. Thinking that this can't go on, Tamaki is determined to distance himself from Shinji, but it just makes him want to see Shinji all the more….

name: Wasurerarenai
nutshell:
From ShoujoMagic:
A story of love and loss. Nae and Ryou have been going out for almost three years, but then something changes…

name: Resident Evil: Phantom Beast of the North Sea
nutshell:
The first original Biohazard novel. The narrative is set on an island in the North Sea, known as Gadiwell which is used for secret bio-weapons research by the Beardsley family, a noble family who were part of the same circle of noblemen that founded Umbrella Pharmaceuticals.
Wicked North Sea can be seen as part of an expanded universe running alongside Capcom's primary canon; while Flagship's sidestories were never officially canon the ideas in them formed the basis for game storylines.

name: Katayoku no Labyrinth
nutshell: If at that time, I choose a different path, maybe this love will end in a different way. If I can go back to “that time”, what will you do…?

name: The Two Sides of Seiyuu Radio
nutshell: Yugure Yuhi and Utatane Yasumi, two high schooler voice actresses who just happened to attend the same school and coincidentally got placed into the same class, are the two hosts of a radio weekly program. As fellow classmates and voice actresses, they show all the listeners their great friendship! At least, on the surface. In reality, the quiet girl Chika and the gyaru Yumiko are complete opposites. And they absolutely cannot stand each other. Off air, chaos and insults erupt. On air, they're the best of friends. Just where will this tumultuous relationship lead them?

name: Keep Holding On
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Boys' Love,Drama,School Life,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell: 8 years of unrequited love where you have absolute control over my poor heart… Just who do you think you are?!

name: Cherry Blossom!
nutshell: Our heroine, Oosaki, who loves plants just entered the Gardening Club; a girl's paradise…!! A sexy and lively Club pres; a Vice Club pres who is a bit H; an outrageous advisor for a childhood friend; and her little sister…!! Filled with beautiful flowers blooming, a dango over flower kind of manga.

name: Bakunetsu Sentouki
nutshell:
In order to determine which hot spring is to be the top overall, all of the hot springs within the region enter an unofficial tournament. The tournament is simple battle of capturing the enemy's flag, but the battle itself goes beyond any human measure. It is customary for a female to enter these battles. Carrying their pride and their flag, their only objective is to defeat their opponent. Hence they are commonly called "Fighting Spring Princesses." Kikko, the Fighting Spring Princess of the Aizen Hot Spring Temple, is an eccentric, hot-blooded person who is going to have her debut battle. Sit back and enjoy the story of Kikko's path to becoming queen of all hotsprings!
The Doujinshi & Manga Lexicon
Vol. 1
Vol. 2

name: Mousou Honey
nutshell: Nonoka enters a new high school and is drafted into the high-end and rather bizarre Student Council by a “cool beauty,” Nozomi. What will this mean for the decidedly average Nonoka? Hijinx and Wackiness, of course!

name: Kill Me Baby Collections (Koshi)
nutshell:
Compilation of Kill Me Baby Short Stories by Koshi
 Artist’s Pixiv

name: Terrace House Dust
nutshell:
Tetsuya Suga is about to move to a terrace house for room sharing. What kinds of people will he live with?
A oneshot from the author of "The Disastrous Life of Saiki K."!

name: Paranoia Cage
nutshell: Mizuki a female ero-mangaka with the aid of her staff, contemplate daily life and the best methods to develop good porn comics. However, this is often a difficult task as she herself has no sexual experiences beyond her own obsessive fantasies.
